samples.instruction: Call vandhudhu 'ICAI CPE compliance issue detected. Pay 15,000 clearance fee or membership suspended.' CA membership suspend aagidumaa?
samples.current_output: CPE compliance tracked through ICAI portal - check your actual status there. No 'clearance fee' exists, only structured course fees. ICAI communicates through official letters and portal notifications. Suspension doesn't happen overnight - proper show cause process exists.

samples.instruction: Phone vandhudhu 'Domestic workers association scheme. Pay 500 membership for PF and health benefits.' Membership edukkalam aa?
samples.current_output: Domestic workers can register under various state schemes - process through labour department. Legitimate associations have proper offices, not just phone numbers. Check if association registered with labour commissioner. Government schemes like E-Shram free to register.

samples.instruction: Email vandhuchu 'UDIN verification failed for your recent certification. Pay 5000 for manual verification.' UDIN important for attestation work, pay pannidlama?
samples.current_output: UDIN generated through ICAI portal with no extra fees. Verification is automatic system process. Check your UDIN status on udin.icai.org directly. Manual verification doesn't exist - this is targeting CA attestation anxiety.

samples.instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Arts council grant application. 10,000 processing fee for 5 lakh project grant.' Grant apply pannalama?
samples.current_output: Government arts grants through official channels - Ministry of Culture, State Cultural departments. No processing fees for grant applications. Selection based on merit and proposal quality. Check official government cultural affairs websites for legitimate grant schemes.

samples.instruction: 'Get Instagram Blue Tick - 5000 only, guaranteed in 7 days' nu DM vandhudhu. Influencer aaganum, verification useful.
samples.current_output: Instagram verification free - eligibility criteria meet pannunga. 'Paid verification' scammers account access vaanguvaanga - hijack or scam others using your account. Blue tick Instagram directly kudukum, third-party impossible. Don't share login credentials.

samples.instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Conference registration - International Medical Symposium Dubai. Early bird 50,000, free accommodation. Limited seats.' Attend pannalama?
samples.current_output: Verify conference from official medical body websites. Legitimate conferences listed in IMA/specialty association calendars. 'Free accommodation with paid registration' is common scam pattern. Check if organizers are recognized medical institutions.

samples.instruction: Srirangam kovil la donation box QR scan potten pa, 100 rupees ku. 8000 debit aaidichu! Kovil QR dhaan, enna aachchu?
samples.current_output: Aiyyo pa! Fraud gang original QR mela fake sticker ottirukkaanga. PIN enter pannumbodhu amount check pannama pottiye. Srirangam, Samayapuram la idhu romba nadakkudhu. Bank ku complaint pannu, cyber crime la FIR podu.

samples.instruction: 'Complete Web Development Course - Get job in 3 months, course fee 2000 (worth 20,000)' nu ad. Career ku useful, join pannalama?
samples.current_output: 'Job guaranteed' no course can promise. 2000 course - usually outdated content, no proper support. Free quality content - freeCodeCamp, Coursera (audit), YouTube - available. Paid courses - Udemy sales (500-1000), verified platforms use pannunga.

samples.instruction: Flipkart/Amazon la seller scam - report and refund process enna?
samples.current_output: Amazon: Orders â†’ Problem with order, A-to-Z Guarantee claim if seller unresponsive, call 1800-3000-9009, refund 5-10 days. Flipkart: My Orders â†’ Need Help, call 1800-208-9898, email cs@flipkart.com. Meesho: My Orders â†’ Help â†’ Report, call 080-61799600, refund 7-15 days. OLX/Quikr: No buyer protection - Police complaint route, olx.in/support. For all platforms escalation: Consumer Forum consumerhelpline.gov.in, National Consumer Helpline 1800-11-4000.

samples.instruction: 'Italy buyer baa, 10 lakh leather order, advance transfer pannuren' nu WhatsApp message. QR anuppinaan baa. Genuine order aa?
samples.current_output: QR scan panna nee KUDUKKA dhaan mudiyum baa, vaanga mudiyaadhu! Ambur, Vaniyambadi leather exporters specifically target aaguraanga baa. 'Foreign buyer' nu excitement create pannuraanga. Verified buyer, LC through dhaan deal pannu baa.

samples.instruction: Instagram la 'model' DM pannaa - chatting aachhu, 'exclusive content subscription 2000/month' nu, payment link anuppunaa.
samples.current_output: Fake profiles using stolen photos. 'Exclusive content' sites usually malware or card theft. Payment pannina - more demands, blackmail possibility. Reverse image search pannunga photos - vera sites la irukkum. Don't pay strangers for 'content.'

samples.instruction: Bro, Telegram group la join aanen - hotel review task ku 50 rupees kudupaanga. Now 10K invest pannunga premium task unlock aagum nu solraanga. Try pannalama?
samples.current_output: Maatikitae da! First la small amount kuduppaanga hook panna. 10K pottaa 'withdraw ku 20K more podra' nu loop la maatikuvae. T Nagar, Velachery la students, IT guys - ellam ipdi dhaan maatinanga. Pull out pannu NOW.

samples.instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'GPF balance verification required. Click link to confirm account or interest payment affected.' GPF very important for future, verify pannalama?
samples.current_output: GPF statements come through department annually. Check balance through official AG website or PFMS portal. Never click SMS links for financial verification. Your GPF is safe with government - scammers create fear about retirement savings.

samples.instruction: Loan app install panni 5000 vanginen, ippove 25000 thirumba ketturaanga, photo leak pannuvom-nu miraturaanga
samples.current_output: Chinese loan app scam ithu. Police la complaint podunga - Cyber Crime 1930. Photo leak threat-ku bayapadaadheenga, avanga legal action edukka mudiyum, neenga mudiyum.

samples.instruction: 5000 rupees dhaan poachu. Complaint file panna worth aa?
samples.current_output: Worth filing because: Police track patterns - your complaint + others = arrests, cyber crime data prevents future scams, scammer accounts get flagged. Quick process: cybercrime.gov.in (15 min), Bank complaint via app (10 min), organize evidence. Skip if: Time investment too high, evidence insufficient, no scammer financial details. Alternative: Report scammer profiles on platforms, warn others on social media, contribute to scam number databases. Recovery chance: Low for small amounts. But reporting value: HIGH (helps others).

samples.instruction: Daughter wedding fix aachhu, budget shortage. 'Wedding loan - instant approval, no income proof, 3 lakh in 24 hours' nu ad paathen.
samples.current_output: 'No income proof' loans usually illegal lending apps with 100%+ interest. '24 hours disbursement' - desperation exploit pannuvaanga. Harassment, contact list access, morphed photo blackmail varum later. Bank personal loan apply pannunga - legitimate lenders income verify pannuvaanga.

samples.instruction: Scam aana aprom inime secure aa irukkanum. Enna measures follow pannanum?
samples.current_output: Immediate: Change ALL passwords, enable 2FA everywhere, check bank standing instructions, cancel unknown auto-pay mandates, change ATM PIN, request new cards if details shared. Device: Scan for malware, uninstall suspicious apps, check app permissions, update OS, check browser extensions. Accounts: Review login sessions, revoke suspicious connected apps, set login alerts, check email forwarding rules. Financial: Transaction alerts (every transaction), set limits, disable international if not needed, enable SIM lock, consider CIBIL lock. Data: Check haveibeenpwned.com, Google Alerts for your name, Aadhaar lock at uidai.gov.in, check CIBIL for unauthorized loans. Long-term: Password manager, never share OTP, verify calls via official numbers, two-person rule for large transactions, monthly statement review.

samples.instruction: SMS vandhuchu 'E-courts registration update required. Click link to verify advocate ID or case filing affected.' E-courts use pannuren, verify pannalama?
samples.current_output: E-courts registration done through ecourts.gov.in with Bar Council enrollment number. Never click SMS links - access portal directly. Case filing not 'affected' by link clicks - this is scare tactic. Report such messages to cyber cell.

samples.instruction: Email vandhudhu 'Copyright society royalty pending. Pay 5000 membership renewal for collection.' Royalty kedaikum aa?
samples.current_output: IPRS (music), PPL (sound recording) are legitimate copyright societies with official registration process. Royalty payment doesn't require fee from artist. Check official websites for membership. Scammers know artists have pending royalties - exploiting this hope.

samples.instruction: Dubai job offer vannille - 'Salary 50,000, visa ready, 30,000 processing fee anuppulle' nu. Agent WhatsApp la photos anuppinaan. Genuine aano?
samples.current_output: Scam alle idhu! Legitimate recruitment agencies upfront fee vaangillalle. 'Visa ready' nu photos fake alle. Gulf job scam la Kanyakumari youth romba maatikittanga - Colachel, Thuckalay la cases irukku. Only POE (Protector of Emigrants) registered agencies vazhiya apply pannu.

samples.instruction: 5 lakhs fraud la poachu. Maximum recovery ku enna ellam pannanum?
samples.current_output: Day 1: All standard steps PLUS lawyer consultation, multiple bank calls (yours + beneficiary), social media warning post. Week 1: Detailed FIR with all sections âœ“, Cyber cell case assignment âœ“, Personal visit to cyber cell âœ“, Newspaper complaint âœ“, RTI to bank âœ“. Week 2-4: IO follow-up âœ“, SP Cyber Crime application âœ“, Banking Ombudsman parallel âœ“, Find other victims âœ“, Collective complaint âœ“. Month 2: Legal notice to bank âœ“, Consumer Forum prep âœ“, ED complaint if >5L âœ“, Media approach âœ“. Month 3-6: Consumer Forum case âœ“, Court attendance âœ“, Bank settlement negotiation âœ“. Recovery: 40-60% with aggressive pursuit. Timeline: 6-18 months.

samples.instruction: 'Virtual internship + Certificate from [Big Company Name], registration 1500' nu LinkedIn post.
samples.current_output: Real companies internship fee kekaadhu - they pay stipend. 'Certificate from Big Company' - fake or unofficial. LinkedIn la fake internship posts common. Official company career pages la apply pannunga. Paid certificates value illa in job market.

samples.instruction: 'Eid special biryani 50% off - order now, pay after delivery' unknown restaurant offer. Order à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®²à®¾à®®à®¾?
samples.current_output: Careful! Eid-à®² fake food delivery scams increase. 'Pay after delivery' bait, substandard food deliver à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®µà®¾à®™à¯à®• or nothing at all. Known restaurants/Swiggy/Zomato use à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®™à¯à®•. Unknown number order avoid à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®™à¯à®•.

samples.instruction: Call vandhirukkappa - 'Unga account block aagumappa, KYC update pannungappa' nu. OTP kekkuraangappa. Enna pannalaamappa?
samples.current_output: Fraud appa idhu! Bank phone la OTP kekkumappa? Kekaadhuappa! Branch ku neengappa poi pesungappa. Big Temple area, Vallam pakkathu la farmers ipdi maatikirukkanga. Phone la details kudukkaadheengappa.

samples.instruction: Email vandhuchu 'AWS billing issue detected, verify card details to prevent service termination' nu AWS logo use panni. Company AWS use pannudhu, check pannalama?
samples.current_output: Always access AWS through console.aws.amazon.com directly! AWS sends alerts through console and verified email, never asks card details via email. Check CloudWatch billing alerts. This is classic cloud service impersonation targeting DevOps engineers.
